name: Pumpkin Garden
description:
Pumpin is a simple clicker.

You need to take care of your garden , collect and sell pumpkins.

You also need defend your house from zombies and skeletons.

From killing monsters and selling pumpking you'll gain gold , which you will use for buying boosts.

Made for MiniJam 89

PS.

Game can containt some bugs , because i had really small amount of time to finish it
